pageTitle: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Blacklist - PCGamingWiki PCGW - bugs, fixes, crashes, mods, guides and improvements for every PC game
textBeforeTable: In-game gamepad settings. In-game keyboard/mouse settings. In-game key map settings. Input settings[edit] Set the values of UseMotionBlur and UseBloom from 1 to 0. Open %USERPROFILE%\Documents\Ubisoft\Blacklist\videoSettings.ini  Modify videoSettings.ini file Disable bloom and blur[edit] Search for DesiredFOV=75 and change its value to whatever you choose, then save your changes. Open Blacklist_game.exe
textAfterTable: Controller Controller support Full controller support Controller remapping Can only toggle between 3 pre-set layouts (multiplayer only). Controller Y-axis inversion The gamepad layout for Single Player/Co-op. The gamepad layout for Multiplayer (Spy).
